text: Ke a itse, ka gore ke ka fa tlase ga taolo ya maotlana a magolo, mme ke na le taolo mo bathong ba me. Ke na le tshwanelo ya gore ‘Tsamayang!’ mme ba tsamaye; kgotsa ‘Tlang!’ mme ba tle; mme ke reye motlhanka wa me ke re, dira se kgotsa sele; mme a se dire. [Jalo, bua fela jaana o re, ‘Fola’ mme motlhanka wa me o tlaa fola!].”
